name: Tanah Lot Temple
description: Ancient Hindu temple perched on offshore rock formation
notes: Best visited at sunset for dramatic views. Can get very crowded.

name: Uluwatu Temple
description: Clifftop temple overlooking Indian Ocean with resident monkeys
notes: Kecak fire dance at sunset is must-see. Watch belongings around monkeys.

name: Tegallalang Rice Terraces
description: UNESCO-recognized cascading rice paddies with traditional irrigation
notes: Visit early morning to avoid crowds and heat. Bring sun protection.

name: Ubud Monkey Forest
description: Sacred jungle sanctuary home to over 700 long-tailed macaques
notes: Secure all belongings - monkeys will grab bags

name: Tirta Empul Temple
description: Holy spring water temple complex with purification bathing pools
notes: Bring sarong and participate in traditional purification ritual (optional).

name: Seminyak Beach
description: Upscale beach area known for sunset views and stylish beach clubs
notes: Perfect for sunset drinks. Potato Head Beach Club is nearby highlight.

name: Nusa Penida
description: Rugged island featuring dramatic cliff formations and pristine beaches
notes: Popular day trip destination. Kelingking Beach T-Rex viewpoint is iconic photo spot.

name: Ubud Art Market
description: Traditional market selling handmade crafts and Balinese souvenirs
notes: Bargaining is expected and part of the experience. Best prices early morning.

name: Kuta Beach
description: Long sandy beach popular with surfers and beginner wave riders
notes: Ideal for surfing beginners with gentle waves. Can be very crowded with tourists.

name: Waterbom Bali
description: Award-winning water park with slides and lazy river attractions
notes: Book online for significant discounts. Plan for full day visit.

name: Mount Batur Sunrise
description: Active volcano offering guided sunrise trekking experience
notes: Trek starts at 2am. Licensed guide required. Bring warm layers for summit.

name: Besakih Temple
description: Bali's largest and holiest Hindu temple complex on Mount Agung
notes: Known as Mother Temple. Hire only official guides to avoid scams.

name: La Favela
description: Eclectic restaurant and bar with whimsical vintage decor
notes: Excellent for dinner and late-night drinks. Reservations recommended on weekends.

name: Warung Babi Guling Ibu Oka
description: Legendary warung specializing in Balinese roast suckling pig
notes: Featured by Anthony Bourdain. Lunch service only - arrives early as they sell out.

name: Canggu
description: Laid-back coastal village with surf breaks and trendy cafes
notes: Popular with digital nomads. Exceptional coffee shop and brunch scene.
